video_prompt: Miniature human figures move and interact on a giant, glowing keyboard. One person photographs a salad-filled key, while another observes. The keyboard's keys subtly shift in luminescence.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Digitally rendered full-frame shot of an illuminated, pale blue/off-white QWERTY keyboard with softly glowing warm yellow backlighting. A clear plastic container filled with fresh green lettuce, red tomato slices, orange baby carrots, and yellow cubes (cheese/bell peppers) is placed in the center of the keys. In the lower-left, miniature figures of a man in a light t-shirt and dark pants (back to viewer) and a woman in a white dress holding a camera stand on the keyboard frame. Soft, even lighting. Plain, light-colored desk background. Whimsical, creative, and healthy eating theme.
refined_video_prompt: Miniature figures dynamically traverse and interact across the keyboard's surface. One figure actively photographs, their movements focused on framing. Another figure keenly observes, their expression shifting with curiosity. The keyboard's vast keys pulse with subtle, changing light patterns.
